title: January 6 Rioters To Julian Assange: People Donald Trump May Pardon
content: Days after he defeated Kamala Harris in the Presidential polls, political observers in the US speculated that Trump would issue pardons for several controversial figures.

title: Newly Found Earth-Like Planet May Hold Key To Humanity's Survival
content: A team of astronomers has uncovered an Earth-like planet orbiting a star located 4,000 light years away from the solar system, potentially offering insights into Earth's distant future.
summary: A team of astronomers has uncovered an Earth-like planet orbiting a star located 4,000 light years away from the solar system, potentially offering insights into Earth's distant future.

title: Opinion: Trump And The Inescapable Musical Chairs Of Politics
content: For Trump to leave the legacy he wants, he will have to be in offensive tackle mode for the next four years and deliver a magical Reaganesque solution to the working class pain. Or else, the Dems might be back in the White House in 2028.
summary: For Trump to leave the legacy he wants, he will have to be in offensive tackle mode for the next four years and deliver a magical Reaganesque solution to the working class pain. Or else, the Dems might be back in the White House in 2028.

title: "Weight Of Things Is Surprising": NASA Astronauts After 235 Days In Space
content: The astronauts, who spent months aboard the ISS, faced a brief and unexpected hospitalisation after their return

title: Canada Discontinues Popular Student Visa Scheme: How It Affects Indians
content: Canada discontinued its Student Direct Stream visa program for international students, amid a push by the country to cope with its housing and resource crisis.
summary: Canada discontinued its Student Direct Stream visa program for international students, amid a push by the country to cope with its housing and resource crisis.

title: Blast Rocks Railway Station In Pakistan, 25 Killed, CCTV Captures Moment
content: A suspected suicide blast by an ethnic militant group rocked a crowded railway station in Pakistan's restive Balochistan region this morning, killing at least 24 people and injuring 46 others.
summary: A suspected suicide blast by an ethnic militant group rocked a crowded railway station in Pakistan's restive Balochistan region this morning, killing at least 24 people and injuring 46 others.

title: Who Is Farhad Shakeri, Afghan Man Behind Alleged Iran Plot To Kill Trump
content: Farhad Shakeri, an Afghan national who was deported from the United States in 2008, has been accused of plotting to assassinate Donald Trump.
summary: Farhad Shakeri, an Afghan national who was deported from the United States in 2008, has been accused of plotting to assassinate Donald Trump.

title: 21 Killed, 46 Injured In Railway Station Blast In Pakistan
content: At least 21 people were killed and 46 others injured on Saturday in a powerful bomb explosion at a crowded railway station in Pakistan's restive Balochistan province.
summary: At least 21 people were killed and 46 others injured on Saturday in a powerful bomb explosion at a crowded railway station in Pakistan's restive Balochistan province.

title: Opinion: Trump 2.0: Doubling Down Or Back To Zero?
content: As Trump prepares to saunter to the White House yet again, it is worthwhile to quote John Wayne, the famous Hollywood Wild West icon: "A man deserves a second chance, but keep an eye on him."

title: 'Khalistani Terrorist Threatened Us': Australian Outlet Facing Canada Ban

title: Indian Official Meets Taliban Minister, Ex Afghan President Hamid Karzai
content: In a significant move, an Indian delegation met Afghanistan's acting Defence Minister Mullah Mohammad Yaqoob and offered the use of Chabahar Port in Iran to businesses in his country, and also discussed extending humanitarian assistance to Kabul.

title: Pak Shuts Parks, Museums As Air Quality Worsens, Multans AQI Crosses 2,100
content: Pakistan's Punjab government in a bid to combat the hazardous smog conditions in the province, shut down amusement parks and museums for 10 days, from November 8 to 17, ARY News reported.

title: Bride vs Groom Over $70,000 Engagement Ring: US Court's Landmark Decision
content: The engagement ring should be returned to the buyer when marriages are cancelled irrespective of whose fault it was for the relationship's failure, said the Massachusetts Supreme Judicial Court on Friday.

title: Amid India-Canada Diplomatic Rift, Justin Trudeau's "Khalistani" Backpedal
